No smell.
Yellow colored beer.
The head doesnt stay. 
Slightly sparkling.
Light taste rather refreshing but not remarkable.

A powerful smell at the beginning (floral, herbs)
The color is amber orange, slightly cloudy with a frothy head.
Sweet and sour taste first and then the full "fruity" taste with a bitter finish.

Blond/yellow beer, with a nice head and rather sparkling.
The smell is rather faint. The taste is slightly bitter (with a citrus fruits taste?) but really refreshing.

Dark and opaque beer.
Coffee smell.
Chocolate taste with bitter taste at the end.

Beautiful gold colored beer.
Fruity scent.
Good at first (hopped taste) than a bitter taste
Strong taste for a 3.8% beer.

Awesome smell but disappointed with the taste.
The smell is really fruity and nice.
The appearance is like a normal pilsner.
Bitter taste.

Red-Brown color with a sour tasting.
There is also fruity note but different as "Duchesse de Bourgogne".
Difficult to describe...

Really complicated to describe this (unique) beer.
With a "red" color. A little bit bitter and fruity.

The head doesnt stay :(
This is absolutely not sparkling.
The color is great and the fragrance is OK.
The taste is pleasant ("strong" but fill the mouth).
